Keywords: Avengers , Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated
TO STRAND THE GRIEVER: Opposing characters within 4 squares and line of fire can't begin moving except during MOVE actions.
RETURN OF THE FANTASTIC FOUR: Friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword within 4 squares can use Leadership.
LONG-RANGE PLANNING: Outwit with a range of 10. Protected: Outwit.

February 19, 2021
Goop
He's got 3 range, he can lock people down 4 squares away but you got to play him carefully. He's got combat reflexes so even with those traits and powers you really need to be ON your opponents here. He combos well with the rare Invisible woman granting him stealth. I like him.
